gaia::security::CertificatePath Class Reference

The class describes a certificatePath , it is a abstract base class, we can not use it constractor a object, add the class in order to expand in future easy at now, the class of X509CertificatePath inherit CeritficatePath. More...

Detailed Description

The class describes a certificatePath , it is a abstract base class, we can not use it constractor a object, add the class in order to expand in future easy at now, the class of X509CertificatePath inherit CeritficatePath. 

 //Assume that we have several X509Certificate file path "test1.crt","test2.crt".

 CertificatePath* pCertPath = new X509CertificatePath();

 gaia::base String path1 = "test1.crt";
 gaia::base String path2 = "test2.crt";

 Certificate* pCert1 = new X509Certificate(path1);
 Certificate* pCert2 = new X509Certificate(path2);

 bool bRet = addCertificate(pCert1);
 bool bRet = addCertificate(pCert2);

 int iRet = pCertPath->validate();
 int iRet = pCertPath->getLength();
 Certificate *pCert = pCertPath->getTrustAnchor();

 //free Certificate
 delete pCert1;
 delete pCert2;
 //free CertificatePath
 delete pCertPath;
